heading: Change of Topic for Debate competition
content: The tamil topic for debate is changed from அரசியல் போராட்டம்: சரியா ? தவறா to செயற்கை நுண்ணறிவு: ஆபத்தானதா ? பயனுள்ளதா ?

heading: Day 2 Technical Event Winner : Technical Connection
content: 1st Price Family Guys - 3rd year DS, 2nd Price Queen Bees - 3rd year DS, 3rd Price Chief Guest - 3rd Year DS

heading: Day 2 Non - Technical Event Winners: Speech Competition
content: Tamil Speech Winners: 1st price Sala C - 2rd Year CSE, 2nd price Keethana G - 2nd Year DS, 3rd Price Sriram P 2nd Year CSE-A English Speech Winners: 1st Price Leena N - 4th year CSE, 2nd Price Upanshu - 3rd DS, 3rd Price Joel Sharon - 4th year CSE-A
